data.name: Soccer World
data.description:
Welcome to the Soccer World VR Game experience! With two thrilling game modes, Sports Mode and Playground, our game promises an immersive journey that challenges your skills. 

SPORTS MODE:

GOALKEEPER PRACTICE: Step into the goalie's shoes, defending the net from all angles. Dive and block shots to keep your opponent at bay!

INFINITE MODE: Take on increasingly difficult shots, testing your reflexes and predicting skills. How high can you score before missing a shot?

PLAYGROUND:

GOAL ATTACK: Showcase your precision and quick reflexes as you shoot past obstacles, racking up points in this challenging game.

FOOSBALL: Experience the classic tabletop game in virtual reality. Compete against the computer in a fast-paced match, using hand-eye coordination and strategic thinking to score.

MEMORY: Engage your brainpower to remember and match various objects. With each level, the difficulty rises, demanding focus for a high score.
With different scenarios available and immersive gameplay, the Soccer World VR Game is the ultimate test of your skills. Brace yourself for the thrills of Compete Mode and the engaging challenges of Arcade Mode!
